data.text: 4.Cooperating with the school staff for your well-being.5.Reporting to school management if you have cov19 symptoms or you suspect anybody having such symptoms. Your timetable vl be uploaded in your respective groups.Wish u all the best as we ink new future in the post-Covid era!

Kindly bring your vaccination certificate along with you and follow Covid appropriate behaviour which includes :                    1.Wearing masks.
2.Maintaining physical distance in and around the campus.
3.Sanitizing yourself from time to time.

The students will attend their classes in a staggered arrangement to ensure physical distance.The schedule has been devised such that the students don't feel crouched in the classrooms. So watchout for the time-table in the school what's app groups.

All stakeholders in a knowledge society from teachers to students are waiting with bated breath to start afresh in the conventional offline mode.We have turned our school into a biosecure zone where no unvaccinated person from the teaching side or the student side can seek entry.
